Title: Stree
Writer: Raj Nidimoru (story and screenplay), Krishna D.K. (story and screenplay), Sumit Arora (dialogue), Pawan Sony (additional story)
Actors: Rajkummar Rao, Shraddha Kapoor, Pankaj Tripathi, Aparshakti Khurana
Plot: In the small town of Chanderi, the menfolk live in fear of an evil spirit named "Stree" who abducts men in the night. Based on the urban legend of "Nale Ba" that went viral in Karnataka in the 1990s.
